title: The Root Schema
description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the girl that's being added.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the girl to show in the information tooltip.
examples: Momo is very sweet, innocent and adorable; with a naive child-like mentality about most things.

age.title: Age
age.description: The age of the girl to show in the Girls window.

cupSize.title: Cupsize
cupSize.description: The cupsize of the girl to show in the Girls window.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: The weight of the girl to show in the Girls window.

smokes.title: Smoking frequency
smokes.description: How frequently the girl smokes. 0 for Never, 1 for Sometimes, 2 for Frequently, and 3 for addicted.

drinks.title: Drinking frequency
drinks.description: How frequently the girl drinks. 0 for Never, 1 for Sometimes, 2 for Frequently, and 3 for addicted.

talentLevel.title: Starting Talent level
talentLevel.description: The starting talent of the girl when you first recruit her.

styleLevel.title: Starting Style level
styleLevel.description: The starting style of the girl when you first recruit her.

fetishes.title: Starting fetishes
fetishes.description: The starting fetishes of the girl.

parts.title: Asset parts
parts.description: Parts of the girl that are assembled together as the complete sprite

items.title: Part
items.description: A part of a girl that is assembled with other parts to form a complete sprite of the girl.

type.title: Part type
type.description: The type of part. Determines functionality of the part (like blinking for EYES, or Z position for BACKHAIR etc.)

file.title: Texture file
file.description: The filename that contains the texture for this file. Must be a .png file.

name.title: Outfit/hairstyle name
name.description: The name of the outfit or hairstyle this part adds. Valid only for OUTFIT and FRONTHAIR type parts.

x.title: Sprite X position
x.description: The position of the part in the X dimension.

y.title: Sprite Y position
y.description: The position of the part in the X dimension.
